game.title: The Last Hope
game.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, humanity's last hope for survival lies in a group of survivors who must band together to find a cure for a deadly virus that has ravaged the planet.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player taking on the role of a survivor who awakens in a deserted laboratory, only to discover that they are one of the few remaining humans immune to the virus. With limited supplies and no clear direction, the player must navigate the treacherous landscape to find other survivors.
game.ending: As the player progresses through the game, they will uncover a sinister plot behind the creation of the virus and the true intentions of the laboratory's creators. The final showdown takes place at the source of the outbreak, where the player must confront the mastermind behind the apocalypse and decide the fate of humanity.
